context: The buttons are already "swapped", or software is required for that?

context: I have a 21 inch all in one. Can I hook it up to it?
response: Yes. I purchased this product though and it did not work, it would hook up to the TV and turn on but it would not read any games I put in it. I tried multiple games none would work.

response: I have no clue. Havent tried it. my son used it for xbox.

context: Does the stick shift move just like in a real car?
response: Yes its a six speed and reverse you push down and far right downwhere sixth gear is.Personally i never use it but their are people that do.I use the paddle shifters.

context: Can the scroll wheel be moved right/left for horizontal scrolling (like in some Logitech models)?
response: Yes it can. While the scroll wheel itself does not go from left to right or vice versa to scroll the page, you can hold in shift. I think that by holding in shift it's a function of your operating system, and not the mouse itself. I was unaware that Logitech's mice scrolled left to right.

context: Is it a free roaming game?
response: Yes. As you progress through the story, more areas open up, but they are all free roam. Think of inFAMOUS as a sandbox superhero game.

context: How long does it take to install do you need wifi
response: It takes 10-20 minutes to install you don't need an internet connection however you do need it to download and install the updates. Obviously the game won't be the same with the updates I recommend updating as it has several improvements to the game and adds more content (Cars, Guns, etc)

context: is this worth the price
response: I think it was worth it because the original price was $200 and I got it for half of that but the game itslef isn't that great

context: Does this come withthe bonus content disk?
response: I don't know for sure if EA has changed the contents since I bought it, but if it's the Platinum Hits edition, the bonus disc SHOULD come with it.

context: Are the cups on this headset circumaural (fit around the ears) or do they lay on the ears?
response: I would say they fit around the ears unless you have really large ears

response: No you have to purchase it separately through amazon

context: On a scale from 1 to 10, how bright is the screen?
response: The screen is not overly bright.  It is good for playing games.  I do not remember if there was a brightness control.  I hope this description is good enough without resorting to a scale.

context: I noticed the bad reviews on this game. I'd like to purchase it, but want to know if the problems still exist with it? Thanks.
response: I had the same problems as the others when I first loaded the program. After some research I went back online and updated my DirectX drivers and the program worked fine. I thought my drivers were already up to date but some additional files were installed. I tried the same process on another computer with success.

context: do we can play a ds games in a ds3?
response: Yes, the Nintendo 3DS, 3DS XL, and 2DS can play 3D games. The regular DS or DSi cannot play 3D games, however.

context: How long does one charge last without charging it again? I guess if I leave on standby, how long will the charge last?
response: I don't understand your question.

context: After installation, would I need to have the disc to play?
response: It has been working for me without the disc in, but I have other WMS games also installed and as long as I have one of their discs in, I can switch to the other games without switching discs.

context: Can you play movies on the wii u console?
response: No the Wii U will only play Wii U games and Wii Games.

context: Is Pokemon X and y a good entry for someone who has never played any Pokemon game at all but does love to play RPG's?
response: Yes.  As a person who has played almost every pokemon game and many other RPGs, Pokemon x and y are easy to learn.

context: Myself and one other person I know purchased this game when it was first released. Now when we load it in Wii it won't work, says it's not readable(both games, no damage to them) ??
response: I purchased this game for my grandson.  It works great, no issues.

context: My 5 year old loves the Pikmin mini game in Nintendoland do you think Pikmin 3 would be too advanced for her?

context: I downloaded the game COD 4 MW but steam isnt working and i cant get to my game!!!!
response: fortunately or unfortunately, you must download Steam, and register to play the game thru them. this is in addition to any other problems you may or may not have.

context: If I swapped the batteries with Rechargeable Eneloops, would this be able to charge them over the wire like the Logitech MX Performance mouse can?
response: I'm not totally sure (I haven't tried rechargeable batteries in mine) but I don't think it would charge them. As far as I know, Razer uses their own battery packs in their rechargeable mouses.
